## Gapminder Table
```{r}
datatable(as_tibble(gapminder))
```

## Life Expectency Across Time
```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(year, lifeExp)) + geom_point(alpha = 0.1, fill = "dark blue", colour = "dark blue") + theme_bw() + ylab("Life Expectancy")
```
